Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: printer is great, some setup issues
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy to Use
Cons: Difficult To Set Up; Flimsy Construction
I got this printer because it was one of very few that were multi-function, wireless, supported auto duplex printing and could handle AirPrint.
Print quality for text and pictures is good. Everything came out relatively true to color (important since I print lots of pictures). Print speed is exceptionally fast. And wireless scan and fax options are wonderful. I also enjoy that I can now print from my iPhone and iPad. Bottom line is I do like this printer a lot however there are a few things I wish were done better:
- Paper Cassette: Paper doesn't stay aligned in the tray very well. The sliders and open end on the feed side allow the paper to shift around a bit. I haven't had an issue ... with anything printing crooked yet, but I imagine that if one wasn't careful that could easily happen
- Paper Output Tray: Not very well made at all. It feels very cheap and doesn't slide in and out easily.
- Wireless Setup for Mac OS Lion: A note accompanies the setup CD to go online and download the printer driver if you are using 10.7. When you go online the site advises you that if the setup CD states 10.7 on it, you should be fine using it. I used the CD and was unable to get my Macs (iMac, Macbook Air) to recognize the printer. So I downloaded the driver online (which took over 2 hours!). Again, was unable to get the computer to recognize anything. Called Epson tech support. They were able to walk me through changing settings on my computer and printer and FINALLY the printer was recognized. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 2 out of 3 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Great print quality; Prints fast
Cons: Noisy; Hard To Use; Poor scan software
Duplex (2 sided) printing feature difficult to use. Must drill down in the print settings to find all needed settings. Printing odd size PDFs difficult to configure. User manual insufficient. Epson tech support out-sourced, hard to understand and unfamiliar with printer. Would only read from script. Disappointed because printer is nice design and compact for an all-in-one.Print quality is great. Appreciate the extra high capacity ink tanks. Although noisy, not an objection in busy office. Great value, but . . . falls short.
Item.HelpfulCount: 2 out of 3 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I received my workforce 645 today. The printer is attractive and looks to be of excellent quality. The instructions were pithy and accurate. Setup was very easy. I'd thought that I would need to use USB and Ethernet cables to have this printer wired to my main PC with the my router, however I was able to set it up without any wired connection and it is now connected to my wifi network and is completely wireless. I am extremely satisfied with the user interface for the printer buttons and I had no difficulties whatsoever. I did a test scan and the quality of the scan was excellent, it is photo quality and very detailed for pictures. I am also very impressed with the software that comes with the printer to email scans directly or to convert to word, excel or adobe. I had read that the ISO pr ... int speed was 15 or so pages per minute? Well it prints quite fast. A page prints out in a matter of seconds. I am concerned about how much ink will be necessary and if that will not be very cost effective however I don't print that much and I think that I will continue to be very happy with my choice. So far, my new printer is exceeding my expectations, even though I knew that Epson quality is very nice. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: You Get What You Pay For!
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time
Cons: Unreliable
I have a home office and I send/receive multiple faxes daily. Great for 3 weeks, now This machine will not send reliably. I had replaced my hp because of printing problems to this Epson. Wish I had never seen it. I can connect the HP and fax (so not my lines) but should not have to. Call tech support 3x in week and 1/2, they change some settings and it works for a few days again. NOT my phone or lines - will receive fine but sending is a chance. Wasted 3 hours this am on phone with tech. support to finally send 1 fax. Had it more than 14 days so Staples will not take it back. Scans documents prior to calling fax number so if I have a 12 page fax it wastes a lot of time to only tell me it has communication errors. P ... rints great if that is all you need it for. Thought it was a great price - now I know why. Afriad to put my old printer in the dump as may have to use it for faxes. HATE this machine. expand » « collapse
Item.HelpfulCount: 2 out of 2 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: After going through a couple of Epson Stylus printers (C60 and C88) I decided to try an all-in-one. The price was reasonable and the delivery time was good. I'm happy with this unit. The scanner is very fast, much faster than the Epson 1250 that I retired as soon as I got the 645. The printing speed is also very fast and the quality is terrific. I especially like the paper tray feature. Loading the C60 and C88 was a real hassle, and the paper jammed frequently. The 645 seems well designed in this way. I'm not set up to use the wireless feature, but I expect that it is also good, if the other performance features are any indication. If you are considering moving up to an all-in-one, I recommend this. As with all printers, the ink cartridges can get pricey. I don't know what the act ... ual page yield per cartridge is yet, but I hope that it is reasonable. The aftermarket vendors have not yet begun to stock refilled carts for this unit, but I expect that they will soon. Great value for the dollar! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: A couple of reservations, but - good printer!
Item.Review: I bought this because my experience with Epson has been good, and because I got a real bargain. Text and graphic printing is fast and crisp. Photo printing is slow, and the results may have been compromised by the quality of the photo paper I used - it was good but not wonderful. It is a nuisance to have to unload and reload the paper tray every time you change from photos to letter size printing, particularly since the paper tray seems flimsy enough that you wonder about the replacement cost and availability. Scanning was good, but for some reason the scanner "analyzed" the image, and it was difficult to get it to scan the whole page, rather than just the logo. Scanning was accurate, and the print-out of the scanned page was identical but not quite as dark as the scanned image. Copies are ... relatively quick and good. Duplexing (double-siding) is easy to figure out, quick, and makes my primary use (printing music) a joy. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy To Use; Durable construction
So far this printer has exceeded my expectations. The functions for the price were better than what you could get from Canon or HP. I will never buy HP again.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Works ok. Not the best, not the worst. Easy to set up, and does everything you'd expect from a lower-cost multi function machine.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Easy To Use
This printer was an awesome buy when it was on sale. It is worth the full price. This printer does it all! It was very easy to set up and got the rest of the office set up wirelessly so easily! And how they say you can print from your iphone easily, it is definitely TRUE!! Great printer. I am loving it in my office!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This product was very easy to install and setup. Love the wireless printing. Print quality is very good for the price point. Cost of replacement ink cartridges is lower than most of the competitors.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Amazing! Best printer I have ever owned!
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Low Ink Consumption; Fast Print Time
Do it all machine at a small price. Epson has a home run with one!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Compact Design; Durable construction; Reliable
Cons: Too much ink used
Overall, a great buy. It's neat and doesn't take up too much space on my desktop. Of course, when I say 'Too much ink is used,' that only applies when doing projects that demand great quality graphics and image presentation. The finished product looks great. I would certainly recommend this to others.
I especially like the ink cartridge system. It is easy to replace the cartridges, and there is less waste because replace each color individually when it runs out. It's a fine product. Definitely a workhorse.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I have had the Epson WorkForce 645 for a less than 24 hours.Good quality out of the box. The packaging and setup have taken about 1 hour.My daughter wanted two sided printing. The control panel is clear and easy to read and understand. Installing the ink cartridges was easy. Had a little difficulty with the paper tray.The paper tray holds 250 sheets, you don't have to make sure there is always paper ready for printing. I would like to see a better paper tray, it seems somewhat flimsy and the paper guides do not slide very easily. This printer is Jamaica's Usain Bolt fast, but you lose 5-10 seconds before start. Usain Bolt think hard before shooting.Excellent print quality and wireless printing features very cool.Doesn't seem to drink the ink cartridges. I didn’t use the fax. Turn on = warm ... up ~ 17 seconds (wireless way#. Scanning average color text presentation ~ 6 minutes 1200 dpi_jpeg_1_high quality_progressive_ICC profile).Extremely pleased. expand » « collapse

Turn on = war ... m up ~ 17 seconds (wireless way). Scanning average color text presentation ~ 6 minutes 1200 dpi_jpeg_1_high quality_progressive_ICC profile). Extremely pleased. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Bought this printer at a sale price primarily for the multi-function ability to scan, fax and copy. I was replacing an HP Photosmart 8510 that was bought specifically for printing photos. I am very pleased with the paper capacity, the automatic document feeder and the fax/scan/copy features, but also had to have good photo printing capability. Otherwise, the Workforce 545 would have been okay, not to mention several competing brands. Haven't had it long enought to know about ink use and cost, but it can't be much worse than the HP.
Just tried the photo printing capability and that is a major disappointment. Both test photos on Epson glossy paper in 4 X 6 resulted in black lines about 1" apart horizontally across the portrait layout and vertically (of course) on the landscape. It now ... appears that I'm going to have to find a way to continue using the HP Photosmart printer any time I want to print photos. I wouldn't be able to recommend this product, just based on the poor photo print quality. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I've used Epson printers for several years and needed a wireless version of a 4 in 1 product. The Workforce 645 is an excellent replacement for my Workforce 500. It is quick and quiet, very easy to setup, fax setup is easy also. Scanning is much quicker than my older printers. I have found no issues and highly recommend this printer. And at this price it can't be beat.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Operating a small office and keeping my parents up on some of the latest technology, I was looking for a printer compatible with their new iPad which provided support for AirPrint. Although this printer was a bit high tech for just their printing needs, the price was unbeatable and with all the extra features was a steal. So much so, that I upgraded my Epson printer and bought one for my small office operation as well. The double sided printing and scanning will help cut costs and leave a smaller eco-footprint. The ink cartridges will save money as well and with two printers in the family, we can cut inventory required to run both printers.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Flimsy Construction; Large Footprint
So far I am impressed. lowered ink consumption, using only black to print b/w. really quick. sharp. using about 2 weeks now.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This is a wonderful printer at such a great price. Setup was fairly easy. I like how it's wireless and how it prints in either black or color what more can you ask for? It certainly meets all my expectations. And not to mention it comes with some sort of air print service so no matter where your at you have a special personal email that whenever you email something to that air print email it prints straight to your printer at your house without you having to be there! I love it!! :)

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Low Ink Consumption
Cons: Large Footprint
Had an HP fax / copier prior. This one costs the same as the HP that was bought 5 years ago. It doesn't constantly clean itself like the HP. Hopefully will reduce the need for frequent ink changes. Prints fast and double sided also, so I save on paper. Whoopie...............

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: So far I like it better than my HP 8000
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time
Cons: Flimsy Construction; Color Printing Not Great
I was tired of spending $120 every time I needed ink for my HP so I started looking for a different brand printer that would work with my MAC and PC and saw this on had airprint capablities. Not sure I needed the fax and copier but turns out I use the machine for printing, copying, scanning and faxing. Prints relatively fast. The print menu is kind of quirky, especially for 2-sided printing (need to select the output option if you are using a Mac) and to resize the print but the menu on the machine is pretty easy to figure out. The print tray is somewhat flimsy. You cannot scan to computer unless you are connected via USB so I scan to a usb stick. Printing in is fine i ... n standard mode but I can barely see it in ecomomy mode. Also, printing a full page color photo in standard mode on regular paper has good color but there are definitely horizonal lines (looks like an accordian fold) about every inch. It's fine for my use and the price was right but it may not be the one for everyone. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy set up and use of.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Jams Easily; Slow Print Time; Too much ink used
I have been using the Workforce 645 for a week So far so good. Nice color prints of my photos already used up one ink cartridge Cyan, others are very low But i have been printing many photos. I wish I purchased the 845 model because it has two Pager feeders and holds more paper.Maybe next time. The 645 is well made and the wireless feature is great. This printer has all the bells and whistles.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Compact Design; Easy To Use; Reliable; Fast Print Time; Wifi; Easy To Set Up
This is great. My kids love (and so do I)that it is wifi. Still very new to me , have not gone through one set of inks yet. Have had it for about 2 weeks now. Print quality wounderful!!!!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Like printer just two much to remember
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Compact Design; Fast Print Time
Cons: Hard Setup
I like the printer just cant figure the scanning part yet. Have printed and made copys dont have it connected to use fax but would like to get that done down the road.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Very Pleased!! I have become a fan.
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything; Easy scanning; Reliable; Excellent video tutorials; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Low Ink Consumption; Compact Design; Easy Setup; Durable construction; Fast; Quiet
Cons: Haven't found any
I bought this Epson when my 2 year old HP 6500 stopped printing. After spending inordinate amounts of time trying to figure out the problem and money due to using up ink cleaning the printhead to no avail and needing a good all-in-one with duplex printing immediately I bought this Epson Workforce 645.
I decided to check out Epson products because my son had replaced his HP 6500 with a smaller single copy Epson printer. Although I'm retired I do a lot of volunteer work and I am a part-time consultant. Due to my personal and business activities I prin ... t a lot of multiple copies and I scan frequently so the auto document feeder, duplex printing and scanning are important features for me.
I am very pleased with this printer and have become a fan of Epson.
1. Because my DVD drive was broken I needed to download the Epson 645 drivers for my Windows Vista laptop. The Epson support guys walked me through that process with great courtesy and efficiency. The download took place overnight and the next morning the setup Wizard finished the problem with no issues including connecting to my wireless network.
2. I needed to check the video tutorials a couple of times (I'm not all that technical) and they were excellent. Easy to follow and straight to the point. The Quick Guide is also easy to follow and informative.
3. The Epson manual and video tutorials include information about the printhead and walk you through resolving printhead issues unlike the HP manuals and online support which act as though such a thing would never happen.
4. This printer doesn't go through a long noisy prep period on startup like the HP did.
5. This printer is faster than the HP 6500 with single or duplex copies.
6. The LCD instructions on the printer are excellent and easy to follow.
7. The ink cartridges are not as expensive as the HP ink.
8. I do not find any part of the printer to be flimsy.
9. I'm a 71 year old grandmother but I was able to carry the box from my car to my house with no problem.
10. When the initial black ink cartridge was low the printer gave me the option of using the color cartridges.
I can't believe how much better this printer is than my HP 6500. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This is a great all in one printer . I had a last minute emergency and my workforce 610 crashed. I went and get this one and this was the easiest setup ever and I love how the paper tray is no longer in the back and makes everything very easy to funtion. even setting up the fax and now also its grate to work with printing from an IPAD and much more.. Got to go.. having to much fun with my printer.. HIHIHI get it you will not regret it .PS the epson personal were even nice enought to get mey a discount for the trouble of my other mone crashing on me and could not have another printer with the same cartridges but this also was returned and credited... GREA COMPANY LOVE IT! THERE IS STILL PEOPLE WHO CARE FOR THERE CLIENTS !!! AND THAT IS GREAT TO KNOW.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I love all the feature of this printer! it's does everything I need it to do. It was very easy to set up, works perfectly (wirelessly) with my network. It did a nice consistent job on a large batch of photos, with even coverage and good color. Document printing copying and faxing is fine too. I highly recommend this printer. Good quality for the price.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I call my Workforce "My Workhorse" because no sooner do I request a print and it starts. I print several copies of my extensive family tree and it prints perfectly every time. The double sided feature is a bonus as it saves on paper and allows cheaper mailing to the family members that have no PC available. I appreciate the size of paper tray as I fill it to the gunnels, saves dealing with it's flimsy design. One "Happy" Epson user, Johnboy.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
This machine replaced a brand new Canon machine that failed during set-up. I have used Epson products before, and have appreciated their good graphic and photo print quality. This promises to be just as good or better. It was a breeze to set up. Software loaded easily and the machine mated well with my network and phone system.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: First week and all is good
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use
Replaced unreliable and buggy HP. Super easy install, found my network immediately and wife's Ipad2 synched right up! Gonna buy a 2nd as a gift. I also compared ink prices but they all seem expensive.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: WorkForce 645 great all around home unit
Item.Review: WorkForce 645 all-in-one for home use does it all. Compact unit with great paper capacity. Can be hard wired to the desktop computer or wireless for laptop with excellent print speed either way. My actual rating is 4 7/8. Only reason my rating is not a 5, is that the collapsible discharge tray is very flimsy. Care must be taken to get it folded back into the unit without damaging it. Everything else on the unit is solid. Purchasing it on sale from B&H for [$] bucks was a no brainer.
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I originally got the HP Photosmart, but after a week in an office environment I knew that was a poor choice. So I got the Epson and it is fantastic! The tray on top is what makes it all worth while! You can put a whole stack of papers in to scan or make copies. The HP only had the flatbed so you have to scan/copy each sheet individually, a huge time waster. No doubt the HP prints more crisp photos, but the Epson is perfect for our office newsletter, shop postings and various drawing prints. The Epson also does automatic two sides. Super easy to set up and instal. Fairly fast printing. More or less compact, mine sits on top of my desk and is not in my way. Has all the ports right on the front for instant printing. I haven't used it for wireless or faxing so I can't comment on those features ... . And like all printers, the ink could last longer and be cheaper. All in all, a terrific addition to the office. Love my Epson much better than the HP (for office use). Hasn't failed me in any way. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use; Reliable
The easy set up was impressive. This is my 3rd Epson and they just keep getting better. All the features of this printer make it a super value. The only negative I've found is the paper tray is a little flimsy and paper sometimes shifts but overall an excellent printer. The fax and scan services work great and wireless adds to the perks. Great machine!!
Item.HelpfulCount: 1 out of 2 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Easy to Use
Replaced an Old HP 5000 series and I like the layout and the control panel. Have only had a few opportunities to use is so far but I like it. Also like the extra capacity cartridges which the HP didn't have. I'd go higher on the rating but I have not had a chance to work through all the functions yet.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Efficient
I bought this printer for home use after deciding to switch over from HP (their ink carts were getting ridiculously expensive). I was hoping to find an all-in-one printer that would produce high quality photos as I am an avid scrapbooker, but I also needed the printer to perform every day tasks. In terms of overall function, this printer does a great job. It was very easy to set up, and I didn't need a USB cable to set it up with any of my computers. I was concerned it might not connect to my air card, but it did. I was able to network three computers to this printer without any problems. So far, it receives the signal wonderfully and prints great.
HOWEVER, if you're a crafter like me and want a photo printer, I sug ... gest getting an actual dedicated photo printer instead of an all-in-one. I've been having problems getting the color to be true unless I select "automatic" color correction in Epson's dialog box. It may be me getting used to the printer and getting used to PSE 10, both of which are new to me, but so far, I haven't been horribly impressed. The one great thing about this printer is that it will print on 110 lb cardstock without any problems, and that was definitely one thing I was looking for in a printer.
My next printer will be an Epson Wide-format model. I will use that one for just photos and scrapbook pages, but be warned that the ink carts for a wide-format printer are $120 versus this printer's ink cost at $20 for a black and $50 for the three colors. Just an FYI. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Reliable
Works well with latest Apple software: AirPrint, software faxes. Two sided printing is very simple!
Con: Ink cartridge size (126) not as easy to find as other Epson ink (69).

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easiest Setup; Quality Construction; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Efficient
This printer was set up to work wi-fi. This has to be one of the easiest of any printer I've set up. In fact it was easier to set up than many which were hooked to a cable (USB or LPT1). Although I did go through the set up until it said to disconnect the cable. Still it was very easy. The scanning is great and printing from 2 different computers couldn't be easier. I really wanted to give the rating as about a 4.8, but that is not possible.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality Construction; Easy to Use; Reliable; Efficient
Cons: Difficult To Set Up
I BOUGHT THE EPSON 645 AS A CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR MY HUSBAND. HE LOVES IT BECAUSE IT IS QUIET, FAST AND THE PRINT QUALITY IS EXCELLENT. WE HAVE NOT PRINTED ANY PHOTOS YET, THAT WILL BE THE REAL TEST! IT IS A PROFESSIONAL PRINTER AT A REASONABLE PRICE!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use; Efficient; 2nd epson
Wish you had told me about the matching cost policy. I purchased one week and it was 30.00 cheapter the next. Now it is to late

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Only had it a short while but so for so good. Was basically plug and play after installing software. Had promlem with fax function but customer rep at Epson was able to help me get it working. Other than that, everything worked great.(Oh,don't unplug printer while computer is on. You will have to reinstall the drivers!) Print quality is okay for general use but is not really photo quality.(I'm a photographer so I guess I'm picky.)

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I have owned a lot of printers over the years. 80% has been Epson, for I find they are the Best money can buy. My last Epson printer was the WorkForce 600 which my wife is now using. The Epson WorkForce 645 is by far the best printer out there. I recommend this printer to anyone that needs a scanner, copier, fax, photo printer and word printer, it does it all, it is one awesome machine.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Installation; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
Only had the printer in use for about one week. Was pleasantly surprised at how easy it was to install. Prints quickly and quality seems good. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: My daughter going off to college for the first time wanted a solid printer which could also scan and print photos or color when required. What a bargain. Better still she unpacked and set it up herself, her first printer, without any troubles.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
Cons: Flimsy Construction
The paper tray is not as good quality as I would prefer. But, it seems to work fine. I just got it, so I haven't used all options, but set-up was a breeze for both IBM and Mac laptops that are all connected via a wireless router. The printer is wireless as well. The network found the printer without any problems. I didn't even have to use the CD that came with the printer. My husband may have had to use it for his Mac, but I am not sure. I need to print envelopes for holiday cards for personal use and work business. I haven't tried this yet. I hope it is easy to work with envelopes as our last printer was a bear!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy To Use; Durable construction
Wish I had purchased this printer first. Would have had less headaches and gotten the job done right the first time.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up
I haven't owned this printer too long, but it has been great so far. We printed our wedding invitations as well as a number of other wedding related items!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: The printer is very good sofar. It is wireless so it makes it easy to use. The only bad thing is that it doesn't come with a printer cable for a wired printer connection. The epson software is also a little bit bloated.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I originally purchased two lower priced Epson All in Ones and then later read the reviews which caused me to return them and buy this Workforce 645. The reviews for the 645 were mostly positive. It is a little noisy but never bothersome. The print copy is excellent and the two sided copying great. I originally had some paper jams but now feel that was due to the cheap paper I was using. I like the multiple color inks that allow the black to last longer. My negative comments would be the high ink price and that when printing a multi page document nearly every other sheet is blank. I have not found out how to stop this from happening. Purchased from Staples who were and are a great source of info.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: We buy, probably to much, but some purchases are well worth the money and this printer is one of those items. We are very happy with our purchase. For the price, you can not pass up this deal. I didn't realize how much I needed a new printer until we purchased this one. We have a Macbook pro and the set up was a breeze. The only reasons I did not give it 5's across the board...It is a little larger than wanted and just slightly loud (not bad, though). And holy cow, does it print fast. All I can say...Happy Printing and then some.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Wow! This was so simple to set up and network with the 6 or more computers I have in my home. I would recommend this to a novice as the step by step made it easy. As I have some network systems that are included I thought this would be difficult but, it was a breeze. Printing is clear, quick and easy to use. Thank's Epson for a great product.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
A very good printer if you have multiple computers and only a limited place to keep your printer. i.e. a cupboard as it's equiped with Airplay, Mac OS X.
At first, problems with the software from Epson, but once talking to the right person in the Philipines downloaded Apples version and all was well, frustrating 3 days.
Works very well, plenty of inputs for cards and sticks, single colour cartridges, worth the price.
Only downside is the flimsie papertray if you need to keep changing sizes of paper.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design
Printer works great. Prints really fast, no issues connecting to wireless connection. Airprint is also awesome from my Samsung Nexus phone. The 2 sided printing is really nice, saves on expensive paper. What more can I say, I love it!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
I had no trouble connecting this printer to my Wi-Fi LAN (802.11n, WPA2-PSK) by entering the key using the front panel. Macs (Snow Leopard, Lion) and PC (Vista) connect easily to print and fax. iOS AirPrint, Google Cloud Print, and Epson Connect Email Print all seem to work flawlessly, although I had to register the printer with Epson Connect from my PC because the Mac software could not find the printer.
I am able to send faxes with no problem, but have been unable to receive them. That's probably the fault of FiOS Digital Voice (VOIP) rather than the machine. The configuration options for receiving faxes are very limited in comparison to Brother multi-function machines that I have used in the past.
One thing that disturbs me is that no password is required to access the bro ... wser interface, so anyone on the network can examine and alter the printer's configuration settings. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Slow Wireless Connection but fast print
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Lots of features
Cons: Slow wireless connection; Hard Setup
Takes too much time from the time you hit print to connect with the wireless router to the printer. Print time is actually fast. Cartridge replacement appears to be half the cost of the printer.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Like everything about it so far
Item.Review: It prints fast, the colors are great, but I don't care for the quality of the economy printing. It's a bit too thin on the use of ink in that setting, and texts are a bit hard to read. Other than that so far so go. I would definitely recommend it for home use.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Glad to be rid of HP
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
I had an Epson 5 years ago. Replaced it with an HP when I loaded a Very Old ink cartridge in it and jammed the print head. HP = Lemon! Problems from day one.
Both printers connected over network.
Bought this printer when HP would not stop its "new cartridge is empty" complaint. Search web for comments on this. HP had NO Solution available!
Glad to be rid of it. Good riddance!
1 - Fast drivers - don't bog down the PC trying to get printer status on start up. 2 - Prints almost immediately - no 30 second plus wait for printing to start. 3 - Effortless double-sided printing - intelligent driver interface 4 - The HP driver had a tendency to cut off the bottom half of the last B/W text line. ... This problem is gone.
A little noisy, after all it is an ink jet printer. If you want quiet, get a laser printer.
So far seems to use less ink than HP. Hope it doesn't have a "replace cartridge soon" "NAG" like HP did every time you power up with a low ink cartridge.
Very satisfied. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I just bought an epson 645 printer/scanner/fax/copier for a price lower than anyone and it was shipped/received immediately. I am extremely happy doing business with B&H and now shop their site among the first.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This printer is for home use on a shared network. The quality and speed are outstanding. A number of features are typically found on higher priced printers such as 2 sided printing, micro card input, ADF for scanning and copy. There is also a scan utility that has numerous options and easy to use. The only feature missing is a separate photo tray.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Efficient; Quality Construction; Easy to Use
Excellent printer. Great quality on letters, forms and other documents. Not the best in photos but everything else is very fast and easy to do. I recommend this to everyone that wants fast, great quality printing.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality Construction; Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Intuitive Controls; Easy to Use
This printer really exceeded what I thought it would be. I've tried almost every function and I'm pleased with everything. I love how much paper it holds too.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: This is wireless??? I can't tell.
Item.Review:
Cons: Difficult To Set Up
Downloading the software is a joke. It has yet to work after three tries. The test page prints well. I thought I bought a wireless printer but you can't prove it by me. I have other Epson products that work very well.
Item.HelpfulCount: 0 out of 1 found this review helpful.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Efficient; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Quality Construction
I was going to rate 4.75 stars, but it is a little noisy. Not nearly as noisy as the one it replaced. I have only had HP printers so far and I like this one better.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Quality Construction; Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use
Cons: None
My Wife was surprised to get this . She really wanted a new All in one printer for some time now. She loves the look and the ease of operation. No problems what so ever from this Work de Force 645.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Reliable; Quality Construction; Efficient; Easy To Set Up
It would really be nice to have software that aids in personal organization. I just started using it though, so I might be able to integrate with other software packages.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Reliable
I switched from a HP photosmart printer and have had great success. The set up was easy but took a little longer than I had expected. now that it is running it is quicker printing and easy to switch to high quality printing. I need more time to find out if the ink will last longer than the HP. All in all seems to be a great printer.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: AirPhone Wi-Fi; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Quality Construction; Efficient; Reasonable size; 2-sided printing; Speedy print
Cons: Poor instructionsmanual; Bit louder than ordinary
I've finally said NO to HP & I'm happy. Experience will show the ink usage. Price shudn't be a factor when yur buying for a few years. Look to the features you want or might need (& don't know it) such as AirPhone & 2-sided printing.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Reliable; Easy To Set Up
I bought this all in one printer after returning a similar product by HP that completely sucked. Also, I already had a workforce printer at home, which has given me no trouble. I use this one at my office and it's great. No complaints!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: So far, I am liking this printer. I have always used Epson at the office and like their products. Set up was easy. I do see where the print trays are a little flimsy. Haven't gotten into scanning anything yet and didn't hook up the fax for the moment as there is a "message center' fax /answering machine that I still use. Got the fax on the printer for future use. Trying to think ahead!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I like my Epson WorkForce printer alot.
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Set Up; Durable construction; Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Use; Reliable; Compact Design
Cons: Cannot Print Lg Banners
I use my printer daily. Some days it is printing calendars for groups, some days it is printing books for other groups, and some days it is used for printing cards (greeting, christmas, etc) and it does a great job at each job. I wish it would do 8.5"X44" banners and I would consider it more perfect.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time
Work at home, plus our daughter is a teacher with one in the class room and grandson in college has one in dorm. Very good quality for the money.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I have had difficulty getting it to run like my last printer/fax machine.I am thinking of boxing it back up and taking it back to the store from which I purchased the machine.I have not been happy with the fax for which we purchased the machine.It either won't answer or the phone won't work because of it.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Hardware but poor Mac Software
Item.Review: The machine is fast and efficient. The Mac software however has had no skill or care taken in creating it for the user experience. In many cases you cannot select B & W printing except through a torturous menu system. The scanner always defaults to the Flatbed and i cannot see a way of changing it to the ADF; this will become very irritating if you constantly are working with multiple copies. The user software interface is not intuitive at all.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time; Reliable; Low Ink Consumption; Durable construction; Compact Design
Cons: None
Works best with Extra High Capacity ink cartridges. They last a long time.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Durable construction; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
I brought this Epson to replace my previous computer, a Canon, which only lasted 2 years. Obviously in 2 years many new features have been added, but the Epson is very productive. I use the scanner very often, and it is very good in saving the document to the right file.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Good paper handling; Easy To Use
For the price an exceptional set of attributes, from high quality printing, to high speed, auto 2 sided and paper handling for scans and copies

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Paper Fee Tray Hard To Us; Jams Easily; Unreliable; Hard To Use
do a lot of committee work, and I am ready to return this printer. auto double sided does not work properly and auto paper feed does not work properly either. The regular paper feeder tray needs to be removed to add paper, very clumsily made.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I use this printer to print out scripts and paper work for school, and it's really fast. The wireless features work great as well. The only problem is ink costs, but thats pretty much a problem with most printers.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Too much ink used
I am a teacher and print a fair amount of color printables on both paper and index - so far, I am very pleased with the ease of use the quality and the reliability. The installation was quick without any glitches and I was up and running in about 20 minutes ! :D

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Low Ink Consumption; Compact Design; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
Recommended this product to several people

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Durable construction; Easy To Set Up; Low Ink Consumption; Reliable; Compact Design; Works with digital phone; Easy To Use
I have only had this printer a short time after spending nearly a year selling Epson products on the weekends at another retailer. My opinion is extremely biased in favor of Epson in general as this makes the 5th Epson printer in my family since 1991. The quality is out of this world! Just one note for those of us with cable phones, read the book to find the right setting to turn off to make it work and talk to your provider to get 'distinctive ring' set up (no extra cost with Charter)

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Durable construction; Compact Design; Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Use; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time
Cons: None I know of
It was VERY easy to set up! Just a matter of a minute or two!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Works Perfect over wired LAN. Easy Install
Item.Review: This printer was up and running in less than 30 minutes. During the install, it updated the firmware and then connected to my network instantly. This was something my $300 Konica laser printer could not do. I had to spend lots of time troubleshooting the network settings to get that to work. My Epson has very good print quality and it's fast. I'm using this printer along with my laser to save on the toner/fuser which is very expensive. I'll use my Epson for more day to day printing.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Use; Very reliable; Fast Print Time; Compact Design; Durable construction
Cons: There are no cons
would buy this printer again with out a thought

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Durable construction; Reliable; Reduces desk clutter
Cons: Can't use FAXAuto pick-up
Not pleased that the FAX Auto pick-up doesn't work without crossing over to my home phone line. My previous FAX worked fine without influencing my other phone line. I wrote Epson for assistance but they answered some other question that wasn't mine. I have to manually answer all FAXes. But I love the WiFi feature. And I love having all these features in one machine.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: I used this printer as a replacement for a Lexmark all-in-one. The ease of installation and the print results are superior to the Lexmark. Faxing is a snap! I would buy another.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
This printer is amazing all the feature are working as mentioned, wireless network is so easy to install,very good quality for printing photos,and documents, for the price you pay you get an excellent product, i recommend this product to a friend and anyone.I am very satisfied.
Thanks Epson.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great Fax....Unless you want to send fax
Item.Review:
Pros: Excellent Scanner; Excellent print quality; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Too Many Transx Errors; Poor Job Sending Faxes
As a fax machine, this is the poorest example we have ever used! The receipt of faxes is so slow, that often times the sender is re-sending us the same fax before the system can ever print. It is obviously coming back to the sender as a failure.
On outgoing faxes, we get more transmission failures then successful faxes.
Works great for our scanning, but overall, this system is a dud! Very unhappy with the Epson 645.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; MAC Capable; Easy To Use; Fast Print and Scan; Air Print WORKS; Full Duplex Scan Print; Quiet; Easy Set Up
Cons: None Yet
Did the research, watched the videos, read the comments here and bought it. Flawless! Had it set up in under an hour and it takes up only a bit more space that my HP P1006 laser printer. On WiFI, shared to my other laptop. Did the AirPrint easily too.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Printer is a little loud, but prints well. Pictures did not print great, but I mostly use it for text anyway and I may have just used the wrong print setting for pictures. User friendly and I LOVe that it scans several documents into one pdf. file for e-mailing.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy set up and delivers as promised
Item.Review: Use as primary printer at home. Does a great job. Print on wired network for a desktop and two laptops. Also I print from Ipad and two iPhones. Works well and maintains network connection.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printer at a great price
Item.Review: Bought this for the office with four users of the printer in the room. Larger paper bin is great, very fast, great color. Would highly recommend for even at work. Doublesided, automatic printing works super unless you are doing brochure paper or cardstock, which has to be done manually. Scanner also is very fast. Have not used the fax yet, nor the wireless feature.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Economy price; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Poor envelope handling; Flimsy Construction
Flimsy construction and poor paper handling make this suitable only for light home use

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Love this printer. Used to use Epson exclusively before switching to HP. Was using HP for about 18months and decided I need to switch back to Epson. The quality of both the machine and output is superior.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: All I can say is that I will never buy a HP all-in-one printer again. Have been an HP user since the start of my computer use. This is my first Epson printer of any kind. The printer is so much faster than any HP. The scanner software really works. You can scan double sided pages with no effort. You can copy double sided pages with no effort. I LOVE THIS PRINTER. Thank you EPSON for such a good product.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Quality Construction
The only bad thing that I can identify after using for a week is the paper tray is very flimsy and the paper has a tendency to be very loose and moves around quite a bit if adding paper before it runs out. Nothing to confine and align it in the rear of the tray. Overall a great printer and the greeting card feature is really nice.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Very quiet; Reliable; Efficient
Cons: Time consuming to set up
I am very pleased with the combo of options and the quality of the printing. It is nice and quiet to operate.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Reliable; Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Quality Construction
This appears to be an excellent machine for a person who has limitted computer skills.The setup was fast and easy and the printing quality and speed are far superior to my previous printer.I am sure as time goes by and I learn more of the varied uses of this model,I will be getting more comfortable with performing many of the special functions other than my primary need of basic printing. So far,so good

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Quiet; Compact Design; Reliable; Fast
Great printer for the price

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Durable construction; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Reliable; Low Ink Consumption; Fast Print Time
Unbelievable Price

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Reliable
Cons: Clumpsy Tray Loading
Trouble free setup. Be careful loading paper!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy to set up prints great and fast.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Fast Print Time
Cons: Large Footprint
Works well wireless with laptop and Ipad using Iprint

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I would buy this product again.
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Durable construction; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Low Ink Consumption; Fast Print Time; Easy To Use
Liked this printer from Staples.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This is awesome printer in reasonable price, high quality , fast speed ,clear pictures , all in one printer best suits home as well offices.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Wireless set up with my 2 Mac's and 1PC was quick and easy. Print quality is excellent. With sale price best value. Great looking printer, small footprint.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Quieter than HP; Efficient; Reliable; Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up
Really like the printer, and the price was RIGHT!

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality Construction; Reliable; Efficient; Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use
Mixed use. Surprised on ease of setup and print results. A+

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Picked up workforce 645 a couple weeks ago, and aside from being easy to set up. it appears to be willing to do all that I ask of it.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: I am very pleased with the printer I got
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
None at this time

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This is my first Epson printer and I like it very much. It was easy to install and I haven't had a bit of trouble using it.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Epson Workforce 645 All in One printer
Item.Review:
Pros: Low Ink Consumption; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use; Reliable
Print quality is great. Paper tray holds a lot of paper.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
Cons: Jams Easily
got it on sale with a 20% off coupon so total was [$]

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Low Ink Consumption; Fast Print Time; Reliable; Easy To Use
I wish I would have switched to an Epson long ago.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Fast Print Time
Cons: Louder Than Most Used
na

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Epson Workforce 645, stay away from it.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up
Cons: Unreliable; Jams Easily; Poorly designed product
The printer was returned, need to say more?

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Too much ink used
But used for work as weel

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast Print Time; Reliable; Easy To Use
Great printer, able to perform all functions easily.

Item.Item: Epson WorkForce 645 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Primarily needed for scan; Easy To Set Up; Easy To Use
